name: gjsify
description: Combine the power of Typescript with the power of GJS

scripts.print:name: echo 'gjsify (root)'
scripts.build: yarn run build:infra && yarn run build:gjs && yarn run build:all
scripts.build:infra: yarn workspace @gjsify/resolve-npm run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-deepkit run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/esbuild-plugin-gjsify run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/cli run build
scripts.build:gjs: yarn workspace @gjsify/types run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/utils run build && yarn workspace @gjsify/unit run build

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
